COMMENT_TX: $Ted Williams threw his bat towards the dugout and was fined $25
some of the putouts in this game are questionable WP for Gromek somewhere

Klaus made a third error at some point in the 6th
ej,whits103,P,summb901,Balls and strikes Sammy White ejected by HP umpire Bill Summers arguing a pitch to Rocky Colavito, whose checked swing was called a ball on what would have been strike three
$the throw hit Ted Lepcio on the face
ej,loesb101,P,summb901,Balls and strikes Billy Loes ejected by HP umpire Bill Summers $Loes ejected for arguing ball 2 to Mauch
